name: Back n Better
description:
Turt returns to fight the demon king again...and again...and again. Each time he is defeated at the hands of the king, he returns with new abilities!

This game was developed for the February 2023 Brackeys Game Jam. As a team of three with close to no experience in game development, we spent as many hours as we could learning and creating this short game. It still needs a lot of polishing, but we had a blast making it.

Apologies, in advance, for the large file size. We didn't have a chance to optimize in the end.
